edu.hcmiu.t3tr1s.graphics

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.hcmiu.t3tr1s.graphics.Rectangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Showable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Block, Button, Shape

    public class Rectangle
extends java.lang.Object
implements Showable
    A rectangle that can be rendered on screen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rectangle

        public Rectangle(Vector3f topLeft,
                 float width,
                 float height,
                 java.lang.String shaderName,
                 java.lang.String textureName)
        Constructor for the rectangle class
        Parameters:
        topLeft - The 3D-coordinates for the top-left of the rectangle.
        width - The width of the rectangle.
        height - The height of the rectangle.
        shaderName - The name of the shader to draw in this rectangle.
        textureName - The name of the texture to paint over this rectangle.
